value.name: Community Policing Helps Resolve Potentially Dangerous Situation in East Oakland
value.description: Neighbors in East Oakland are getting praise for helping defuse a situation involving police and an armed man passed out in a car.

value.name: Officers Who Shot and Killed Armed Homeless Man Take Firings to Ninth Circuit
value.description: Oakland police officers fired 22 rounds at 31-year-old Joshua Pawlik, found sleeping with a gun at his side in a West Oakland alley on March 11, 2018. Video from the shooting disputed the officers’ claims that Pawlik was alert and aggressive when they ...
